snippet: The heart of the president’s re-election campaign can be found in a Chicago office complex, where political strategists, data analysts and other workers search online to reconnect with supporters from four years ago.
abstract: Heart of Pres Obama's re-election campaign can be found in a Chicago office complex, where political strategists, data analysts and other volunteers search online to reconnect with supporters from 2008; office in the Prudential Plaza building with more than 300 workers has already spent $48 million and has created technology that can make its Web site, barackobama.com, fit perfectly onto any smartphone screen.

byline.original: By JIM RUTENBERG and JEFF ZELENY

lead_paragraph: The heart of the president’s re-election campaign can be found in a Chicago office complex, where political strategists, data analysts and other workers search online to reconnect with supporters from four years ago.

headline.seo: Obama Campaign’s Vast Effort to Re-Enlist ’08 Supporters
headline.main: Obama Mines for Voters With High-Tech Tools
headline.print_headline: Obama Mines for Voters With High-Tech Tools
